content: this legal document outlines the division of assets between two parties referred to as mr cf and mr cma the assets in question are two urban areas a warehouse and a garage the document provides specific details about each property including their size category class and cadastral income it states that mr cf is attributed a share valued at €50000 which includes certain properties while mr cma is attributed a share of the same value but with different properties the document is signed by a notary and witnessed by several individuals and it stipulates the division of assets and the full ownership of each party the text also mentions a donation but the details are not provided
